metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20450 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: The read_MSAT function in ole.c in libxls 1.4.0 has a double free that allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted file, a different vulnerability than CVE-2017-2897.

criterions.comment: r-cran-readxl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
